name: Annual Deaths by Causes
description: Dataset reporting annual number of deaths by various causes across countries and years.

columns.name: country
columns.description: Name of the country.

columns.name: code
columns.description: Three-letter country code (ISO alpha-3).

columns.name: year
columns.description: Year of observation.

columns.name: meningitis
columns.description: Annual number of deaths caused by meningitis.

columns.description: Annual number of deaths caused by Alzheimer's disease.

columns.description: Annual number of deaths caused by Parkinson's disease.
